meanings.definition: A person or thing that kills
meanings.sent1: The hunters were skilled killers in the forest.
meanings.sent2: The police were searching for the serial killers in the city.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought the laser pointer was a killer toy.
meanings.sent4: The storm was a killer of the crops in the fields.
meanings.sent5: The poison was a silent killer lurking in the shadows.

meanings.definition: A very difficult or demanding task or situation
meanings.sent1: Studying for the exam felt like facing a killer challenge.
meanings.sent2: Completing the obstacle course was a real killer for the participants.
meanings.sent3: Trying to untangle the Christmas lights was a killer puzzle.
meanings.sent4: The final level of the game was a killer mountain to climb.
meanings.sent5: The maze was a killer to navigate through in the dark.

meanings.definition: A type of song or film that is very popular and successful
meanings.sent1: The new action movie was a killer at the box office.
meanings.sent2: The catchy pop song became a killer hit on the radio.
meanings.sent3: The comedy show was a killer in making everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The thriller novel was a killer in keeping readers on edge.
meanings.sent5: The viral video became a killer sensation online.
